bio: I’m a Full-Stack Developer with a passion for building dynamic and scalable applications using JavaScript, React, and modern web technologies. I specialize in creating seamless user experiences by combining frontend performance with backend scalability. I thrive at the intersection of design and development, always striving to craft solutions that are not only functional but also elegant and efficient.

Currently, I’m working as a React Developer, where I focus on developing and maintaining high-performance applications while keeping an eye on the latest industry trends. I believe in continuous learning and constantly improving my skills to stay ahead in the fast-paced tech world.

Over the years, I’ve had the chance to work on various projects, from large-scale enterprise applications to smaller, more agile solutions, all while ensuring that both the user experience and backend architecture are top-notch. I enjoy solving complex challenges and exploring new technologies that push the boundaries of what’s possible.

When I’m not coding, I’m usually playing badminton, tinkering with my home server setup, or binge-watching shows and movies. I’m always looking for new ways to improve both my personal projects and my workflow, from automation to experimenting with innovative tech solutions.
Let’s connect and create something amazing together!
